post.body: At gate waiting for flight to DC. Incubation week, kewl wk long program to help software startups. loosly related to Bizspark
Leaving for Denver Airport on a snowy Colorado Day. So begins the incubation week for Dynamics :)
At a Christmas Concert...Sleigh Bells ring...
Singing Christmas Carols
Finished SFO roundtable. Taking red eye to Dallas and have CTO Roundtable there tomorrow morning. i must love my job :)
At CTO Roundtable in SFO. Great discussion on Azure and how MS can help ISVs... have ideas... ping me
Flying to SFO. First winter storm in CO making the trip a bit more interesting
Looking at snow... thinking about motorbikes
Entering Turkey Coma

At Xaml Fest in Denver...
Very cool how fast you can get things done.
John Pelak is with us for weekend. Getting ready for XamlFest. Gave him a lesson on the small Motorbike.
Windows 7 Day 8: Loving the new Task Bar.. Whey you have lots going on... very useful
Got a few remarks on Flawless... To be clear, I am not claiming product perfection. Simply commenting on execution experience on my box.
Day 7: Windows 7 still flawless
have completely converted to Windows 7 ... not going back
Another weekend... Another Motorbike Ride :) Tomorrow... Denver
Today Microsoft made a HUGE announcement on how we are going to support Startups. http://www.microsoft.com/bizspark/
At the Southern Colorado User Group meeting. Tonight featuring ASP.NET MVC
defrag is definitely worth the time. greeat insights into impact of internet on hunan interaction... where os ot all headed
Off to Defrag in Denver
Dinner in Denver with my wife
Dinner in Denvcer with my wife
Just landed in Denver. It was a long week. Both Incubation week and the Redmond ISV Roundtable were huge successes. Long but worth it.
IW Dynamics: Was a great week. All 5 teams made huge strides. Panel was insightful. I leared a ton. Thanks all (nice job Sajay)!
IW: Highland Martin created a great integration solution for MS CRM. Very nice preso
IW: Preso 3 (Channel Blade). Amazing progress in one week.
IW: SoSell presentation. A kewl social selling app Using MS CRM as a platform. Grear presentation to the investor panel.
IW: watching first presentation to panel. (Dub Me Now) very impressive. great progress for 1 week
IW: At the social. All teams ready for investor panel tomorrow. after dinner, i will finally sleep.
Red eye/center seat... oh well... back in DC now
Boarding 'red eye' from Seattle to DC. Once there full day at incubation event. I must love this job :)
IW Day 3: had to Fly from DC to Redmond for Partner Roundtable. Reports indicate all teams making great progress
IW Dynamics Day 2: All teams running well. Listening to an Incubation expert from the DC area. He is telling teams how to talk to investors
IW Dynamics End day 1: 5 teams, 5 great product ideas based on XRM platform. Things going so well we are thinking of adding team 6 in am.
IW (Dynamics): morning classes were great! had great chat with 1 team at lunch. Great product concept!
Incubation Week for Dynamics (DC): Today we have many hrs of training on the XRM platform. let the games begin (and the sleep stop)
